root.title: bangor hydro bang seek rate cut
root.body: bangor hydro electr cor sai file main public util commiss mpuc two stage base rate reduct bangor hydro sai first stage take effect april 1 stai effect mpuc make final decis file cut revenu 6.149 mln dlr 9.7 pct compani sai lower feder incom tax lower capit cost prompt file second stage bangor hydro sai effect mpuc make final decis call addit revenu reduct 712,000 dlr 1.1 pct bangor hydro sai approv cut reduc residenti base rate 8.5 pct 7.5 pct cut april 1 util compani also sai seek increas fuel cost adjust rate april 1 bangor sai increas approv offset much base rate cut mai caus net increas custom rate
